procedure: Guida user a configurare Rules.Vault/config/connections.json e secrets.json. Reference: Rules/ADO_SETUP_GUIDE.md. Templates in Rules.Vault/config/*.template. Steps: 1) Copy templates, 2) Edit connections (org/project), 3) Get PAT da ADO, 4) Edit secrets, 5) Test con get-ado-iterations.ps1.
